channel.title: Dragon Scape X (Looking for developers)
channel.description: Hello, I think I should rather introduce myself first since it's the first time I ever request something on here. So I'am Jake, currently hosting Dragon Scape X which is basically 667/711, I have studied a little bit of Java, and I know the basics about setting up a private server, I have previously worked with almost all the past runescape revisions and decided to take a step ahead of me. So all I'm requesting is a couple of people who have experience in the 667/700+ revisions who can help me make something out of this server, and hopefully it will be something good. So if anyone's interested, please leave me a comment. The website for the server is http://dragonscapex.wix.com/rune Just incase you want to have a look at it and try the server for yourself. Thank you very much.

item.title: Dragon Scape X (Looking for developers)
item.dc:creator: @ChatX2012 ChatX2012
item.description:
@ChatX2012 wrote:

Hello, I think I should rather introduce myself first since it’s the first time I ever request something on here.
So I’am Jake, currently hosting Dragon Scape X which is basically 667/711, I have studied a little bit of Java, and I know the basics about setting up a private server, I have previously worked with almost all the past runescape revisions and decided to take a step ahead of me.
So all I’m requesting is a couple of people who have experience in the 667/700+ revisions who can help me make something out of this server, and hopefully it will be something good.
So if anyone’s interested, please leave me a comment.
The website for the server is http://dragonscapex.wix.com/rune
Just incase you want to have a look at it and try the server for yourself.
Thank you very much.

Read full topic
